# Front Matter

This document outlines procedures and technical details for the integration of data from 2022 HEAL Parks studies to their own REDCap project. The code contained in this script reads prepared data and reformats it to the 2023 standard (year of this preperation.) 

For general information about the project please review the git (make into link) or contact Seth Schromen-Wawrin (email link)
